model

Interface ISimpleBetFair

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleBetfair

    public interface ISimpleBetFair
    Interface for classes that are to provide simple interaction with objects implementing IBetFairCore
    Author:
    Craig

    • Method Detail

      • login

        java.lang.String login(java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       java.lang.String certPassword,
                       java.io.File certFile)
        Attempt a log in to Betfair
        Parameters:
        username - Betfair account username
        password - Betfair account password
        certPassword - Certificate file password
        certFile - Users certificate file
        Returns:
        Success or failure with reasons

      • getSupportedSportList

        java.util.List<BetfairSportObject> getSupportedSportList()
        Get the list of sports that Betfair allows betting on
        Returns:
        BetfairSportObjects, one for each sports which contains name and id

      • getGameListForSport

        java.util.List<BetfairGameObject> getGameListForSport(java.lang.String sportId)
        Get a list of games for the sport. The games returned are all either in play or not started (provides 2 day look ahead)
        Parameters:
        sportId - The id of the sport you want a game list for
        Returns:
        List of BetfairGameObjects, one for each game. Inside is the game id and names

      • getGameListForSport

        java.util.List<BetfairGameObject> getGameListForSport(java.util.List<java.lang.String> sportId)
        Get a list of games for the sport(s). The games returned are all either in play or not started (provides 2 day look ahead)
        Parameters:
        sportId - The id of the sport you want a game list for
        Returns:
        List of BetfairGameObjects, one for each game. Inside is the game id and names

      • getMarketsForGame

        java.util.List<BetfairMarketObject> getMarketsForGame(java.lang.String gameId)
        Get the list of markets for the given gameId
        Parameters:
        gameId - The id of the game that the markets are for
        Returns:
        List of BetfairMarketObjects, each representing a market available for the game.

      • getMarketInformation

        java.util.List<BetfairMarketData> getMarketInformation(java.util.List<java.lang.String> marketIds)
        Get live market data for the requested markets
        Parameters:
        marketIds - List of market ids that the data is for
        Returns:
        List of BetfairMarketData objects, one for each of the requested marketIds

      • getBetFairObject

        IBetFairCore getBetFairObject()
        Returns:
        instance of the underlying IBetFairCore object that is performing requests for this object.

      • setDebug

        void setDebug(boolean debugValue)
